SELECT c.uid, temp.contactUid, u.nick_name contactNickName, u.pic_uid picUid, temp.chatContent FROM t_conversation c INNER JOIN t_user u ON c.receive_user_uid = u.uid LEFT JOIN (SELECT CASE WHEN send_user_uid = #{userUid} THEN receive_user_uid ELSE send_user_uid END contactUid, content chatContent, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY CASE WHEN send_user_uid = #{userUid} THEN receive_user_uid ELSE send_user_uid END ORDER BY create_time DESC ) rn FROM t_chat WHERE #{userUid} IN (send_user_uid, receive_user_uid) AND STATUS = 1) temp ON temp.contactUid = u.uid AND temp.rn = 1
AND u.nick_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY case when c.update_time is not null then c.update_time else c.create_time end DESC
